original_text: After he had sent them across the stream, he sent over all his possessions.
korean_text: 그들을 인도하여 시내를 건너가게 하며 그의 소유도 건너가게 하고

sentences.original_text: After he had sent them across the stream
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 시내 건너편으로 보낸 후에

sentences.original_text: he sent over all his possessions
